DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate clinical efficacy azithromycin microspheres treatment outpatient moderate severe inflammatory acne compare first line treatment minocycline 8 week therapy
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy And Safety Of Azithromycin SR Compared With Minocycline In Acne
DOC.detailed_description: The study prematurely discontinue February 1 , 2008 due slow enrollment.It note safety concern see study factor decision .
DOC.criteria: male female , > 16 year age , diagnosis acne papulopustular , moderate ( 1930 GAGS score ) severe ( 3133 GAGS score ) pregnancy , gastrointestinal endocrinological disease , specific systemic disease , hormonal contraceptive , isotretinoin , topic drug acne ( except detergent allow )
